EmailTemplate.name: Primary_Seconday_info_not_updated1
EmailTemplate.subject: Primary/Secondary Applicant details not updated in the system
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Beena,
Details of Primary/ Secondary Applicant/s for ({!Unit} in {!Project} need to be updated. Please inform {!RM} to update the detail/s of the client and re-initiate the registration process.
Thankyou. Dynamix
